source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMA<tab>They're here, Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMA<tab>Messire Aldynn, les Héritiers de la Septième Aube sont arrivés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHN<tab>And I for one am grateful that they are. I'm told you've been busy since our paths last crossed at the Ghimlyt Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHN<tab>Ah, te voilà<var 1D /var>! On ne s'était pas vus depuis Ghimlyt... Je constate avec plaisir que tu as l'air en pleine forme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Not that I understand half of it. When the Scions spoke of other worlds, I'd struggle to describe what I pictured.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Tes amis Héritiers m'ont bien tenu informé de la situation, mais je dois avouer que ces histoires de reflets dépassent mon modeste entendement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>Mayhap things would seem clearer were I to hear the tale from your own lips, but I'm afraid the situation will not afford us that luxury.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>J'adorerais écouter ton propre récit des événements... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, nous avons d'abord une affaire urgente à régler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHN<tab>I trust you two require no introduction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHN<tab>Voici la personne qui m'a mis au courant. Inutile de faire les pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions, je suppose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We meet again, hero of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Comme on se retrouve, <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> d'Éorzéa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Must we repeat this ridiculous display? I pose no threat to you─though what I come to warn you of very well might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Sois sans crainte. Je suis ici en ami, pour vous prévenir de l'émergence d'une nouvelle menace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHN<tab>Had he meant to do us harm, I hazard he would have kept to the shadows─and brought more than two companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHN<tab>Je pense qu'on peut lui faire confiance. S'il mentait, il ne se serait pas aventuré en terre ennemie avec une escorte aussi réduite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN<tab>We need not pretend to be the best of friends, but I hope we can put aside our differences for the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN<tab>Crois-moi, j'étais d'abord tout aussi déconcerté que toi. Mais la détermination de Gaius m'a convaincu de l'écouter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>As you are doubtless aware, Ser Estinien and I cooperated to rid the world of Black Rose in your absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Vous devez déjà savoir qu'Estinien et moi avons provisoirement conclu une alliance de circonstance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Our journey together took us as far as the imperial palace, where we witnessed Emperor Varis meet his death at Zenos's hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Au palais impérial, nous avons tous les deux vu de nos propres yeux Zenos assassiner l'empereur Varis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Being the sole witnesses to this crime, and in no position to defend our innocence, we were then forced to flee, each pursuing his own avenue of escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Après avoir écarté les gardes qui nous croyaient coupables, nous nous sommes séparés. Là, votre ami chevalier dragon s'est retrouvé nez à nez avec une arme magitek encore jamais vue...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>When we were later reunited, Estinien claimed to have encountered an unfamiliar kind of machina during his flight. But to me, his description seemed anything but. And upon further investigation, I found that I was right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Quand j'ai entendu sa description, je n'en ai pas cru mes oreilles. Mais après quelques in<var 16 /var>ves<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>tions avec mes hommes, le doute n'est plus permis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Empire is developing a new Ultima Weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>L'Empire développe en secret les successeurs de l'Ultima Arma.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILE<tab>What? That Allagan monstrosity? Created to vanquish primals? ...With which you yourself once thought to conquer Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILE<tab>L'Ultima Arma<var 1D /var>!? Celle que vous avez employée lors de l'invasion d'Éorzéa<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The same. In my foolishness, I sought to harness its power─and became the Ascians' pawn in so doing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Oui, l'arme anti-Primordiaux conçue par Allag, celle-là même que j'ai stupidement réactivée sur le conseil des Asciens...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But you know as well as I how that tale ended.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Mais comme vous le savez, elle n'était pas de taille face <var 08 E905 ((à l'héroïne)) ((au héros)) /var> qui se trouve devant nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Weapon itself, excavated from beneath this very city, was destroyed ere we could fully unravel its secrets. And that should have been the end of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Lorsque l'originale a été exhumée des ruines sous Ala Mhigo, jamais je n'aurais cru nos ingénieurs capables de reproduire sa technologie... surtout pour créer d'autres modèles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But, unlikely as it sounds, the Empire's efforts to recreate it have somehow borne fruit─primarily through secret research conducted by the VIIth Imperial Legion, it would seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Et ce n'est pas tout. Il semblerait que ce projet confidentiel ait été confié à la 7e légion impériale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE<tab>Wait. The VIIth was all but annihilated at Carteneau─along with its legatus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE<tab>La 7e légion... C'est bien celle du général Nael van Darnus<var 1D /var>? Je croyais qu'elle avait été décimée à Carteneau, il y a cinq ans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Indeed, few survived. The VIIth as it is now has little in common with the legion led by van Darnus, and its leadership has changed hands several times since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Exactement. Après la bataille, elle ne comptait que quelques survivants. L'entité actuelle a été formée par la suite, et n'a donc pas grand-chose à voir avec l'originale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Precisely how this project has continued despite such turmoil, and under whose auspices, remains a mystery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>D'ailleurs, de nombreux officiers se sont succédé à sa tête depuis, et j'ignore qui la dirige à ce jour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>What we do know, however, is that a number of prototypes have been produced...and that one of them is on its way to Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Tout ce dont je suis sûr, c'est que plusieurs prototypes d'armes ont déjà été construits, et que l'un d'eux est sur le point d'être envoyé en Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We attempted to stop it, but it was all we could do to slow its progress. So we resolved instead to bring you warning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Mes hommes et moi avons fait notre possible pour l'empêcher, mais nous avons à peine réussi à retarder l'échéance. J'ai alors pris la décision de rallier Ala Mhigo pour donner l'alerte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMA<tab>And right glad are we that you did─though it soundly dashed our hopes that tensions might ease at last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMA<tab>Juste au moment où la situation commençait à s'apaiser, nous voilà avec un nouveau problème sur les bras. Et non des moindres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN<tab>As it is, we've begun to strengthen our presence in the Ghimlyt Dark, and are assembling a force to meet the coming threat. A force with you in its vanguard, I hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN<tab>En apprenant la nouvelle, j'ai im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment donné l'ordre de renforcer nos défenses au front de Ghimlyt. J'étudie depuis les options qui s'offrent à nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Before you say anything, I know full well you have pressing concerns of your own. Your comrades remain in peril, and I would not ask you to forsake them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Et comme tu peux t'en douter, c'est la raison pour laquelle je t'ai <var 08 E905 ((appelée)) ((appelé)) /var>. Puisque tu as déjà affronté et vaincu l'Ultima Arma, j'aimerais que tu mènes l'offensive contre notre nouvel ennemi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHN<tab>But the fact remains that you and you alone have faced the Ultima Weapon and emerged victorious. We need you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHN<tab>Bien sûr, rien ne t'y oblige. J'ai par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment conscience que tes compagnons Héritiers se trouvent eux-mêmes dans une situation des plus délicates.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>And so, when the time comes─<var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> your comrades can spare you─I bid you lend us your strength. I've assigned an officer to await your word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>Si tu te sens en mesure d'accepter cette res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té, fais-le savoir à mon officier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Ascians' downfall was to be the work of my remaining days...but it was my hand that kindled these flames, and I cannot allow them to spread any further.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Bien que la chasse aux Asciens soit ma priorité, j'ai le sentiment que c'est le destin qui a placé cet adversaire sur ma route. L'heure est venue de régler mes comptes avec ce passé que je pensais derrière moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>I will do what I must to see this mistake consigned to history once and for all...even if it means begging your aid. The fates will enjoy the irony, even as I endure the ignominy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>T'allier avec moi alors que nous avons déjà croisé le fer ne t'enthousiasme sûrement pas. Que dire... si ce n'est que t'avoir à nos côtés nous galvaniserait lors de la bataille qui s'annonce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA<tab>I too shall make for the border and offer my skills, meager though they seem in such company. Mayhap we shall meet there anon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA<tab>Permettez-moi de vous accompagner. À défaut de faire la différence au combat, je vous apporterai le soutien nécessaire pour que tout votre potentiel puisse s'exprimer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILE<tab>Though we can ill afford to ignore the coming of a new Ultima Weapon, our friends' plight grows ever more precarious, and none save you can join them in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILE<tab>Il va sans dire que cette nouvelle Ultima Arma constitue une menace de taille, mais l'état des Héritiers n'en reste pas moins critique. N'oubliez pas que personne d'autre que vous ne peut se rendre à sa guise dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>I only hope you are not forced to make a choice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>Vous <var 08 E905 ((seule)) ((seul)) /var> pouvez décider à laquelle de ces missions vous préfèrez accorder la priorité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bien, puisque tout le monde est là, écoutons les nouvelles que notre ami apporte du monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bien, puisque tout le monde est là, écoutons les nouvelles que notre amie apporte du monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>A new <var 1A 02 /var>Ultima Weapon<var 1A 01 /var>...? We must count ourselves lucky that Gaius has pledged his assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>L'Empire a bien choisi son moment pour nous mettre une nouvelle Ultima Arma dans les pattes. L'aide de Gaius ne sera cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas de trop...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>While this is indeed a worrying development, I think the state of the Empire as a whole greater grounds for concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est un problème, en effet... Mais au-delà de ça, que va devenir la nation de Garlemald<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>With the Emperor slain and Zenos returned, it is impossible to predict how matters will unfold in Garlemald. The Ultima Weapon may be but the first of many unpleasant surprises.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>Entre les révoltes à la capitale et Zenos qui est revenu d'entre les morts, tout cela ne me dit rien qui vaille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGER<tab>The situation beareth closer observation, of that there is no doubt─and doth compound our need to return unto the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGER<tab>À l'heure actuelle, tous les scénarios sont envisageables. C'est bien pour cela qu'il nous faut parvenir à regagner le monde primitif le plus rapidement possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then let us address that issue. Our long search for a means to see you safely home may well be nearing its conclusion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bon, il est temps que je partage avec vous l'avancée de nos travaux sur ce fameux accessoire magique qui vous permettra de faire le voyage sans perdre la mémoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thanks in large part to Urianger and Beq Lugg's invaluable insight, we have succeeded in fashioning a vessel for the journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Grâce à la précieuse col<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>bo<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tion de Beq Lugg et Urianger, nous avons réussi à mettre au point un prototype basé sur une auralithe blanche, comme nous l'avions prévu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGG<tab>We set out to create a crystalline container retaining the more useful properties of white auracite, but without its regrettable limitations. And after a good deal of trial and error, we made one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGG<tab>Plus que notre modeste con<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion, c'est surtout la qualité remarquable de l'auralithe qui a rendu cela possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG<tab>An ark for soul and mind both, that will allow your incorporeal self in its entirety to be ferried between worlds... A “spirit vessel,” if you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG<tab>En travaillant très légèrement la pierre pour lui apposer les appendices nécessaires, nous avons créé ce “conducteur spirituel”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>However...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>Seulement...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>However?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Puisque l'accessoire est achevé, quel est le problème<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER<tab>Though the vessel is possessed of the requisite qualities to hold mind and memory, it wanteth yet for a means to <var 1A 02 /var>receive<var 1A 01 /var> of them. For that, we must needs imbue it with the Exarch's innate gift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER<tab>Le réceptacle est prêt, en effet. Mais pour que notre mémoire accompagne nos âmes, il nous faut encore le pouvoir des “yeux de rang” portés par l'exarque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA<tab>A gift that lives on only through the blood of the Allagan emperors...which certainly does not flow within auracite, or any other crystal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA<tab>Je commence à comprendre. Cette capacité innée à transmettre la mémoire nécessite le sang de l'exarque comme catalyseur, et bien évidemment, ce conducteur spirituel n'en contient pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGER<tab>Just so, milady. The blood serveth as a conduit of sorts─in its absence, memory cannot pass from mind unto mind, nor from flesh unto crystal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGER<tab>Exactement. Il nous faut donc trouver un moyen de doter notre accessoire de cette faculté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, we must either alter the process of inheritance so as to require no such thing, or determine a means by which my blood may permeate the vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour cela, deux solutions s'offrent à nous. Soit nous essayons de recréer cet enchantement de zéro, soit nous incorporons mon propre sang au conducteur spirituel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am hopeful that the records found within this tower will yield the knowledge we require to pursue one or the other of these avenues.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Voilà pourquoi j'épluche jour et nuit toutes les notes de recherches laissées par mes ancêtres allagois dans la Tour de Cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGG<tab>As well you should be! The Allagans' body of aetherological research is extraordinary. I can scarce believe it the work of ages past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGG<tab>J'ai encore du mal à croire que les magismologues de l'ancien empire d'Allag ont développé ces méthodes il y a des milliers d'années. Leur civilisation était in<var 16 /var>croya<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment avancée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGG<tab>But its underlying principles are not so very different from those of my own field of study. Given time, we will find the answers we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGG<tab>Mais pas au point que je sois com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment perdu. Je continuerai de vous aider au mieux de mes capacités.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I know that you can ill afford to wait, and it pains me that I must ask you to do so. I can only reaffirm my promise to you that a solution will be found.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dans une telle situation, cela peut sembler mal placé de vous demander plus de temps. Mais comme par le passé, je vous fais le serment de réussir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever it takes, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> see you safely home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je vous en prie, faites-moi confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>My apologies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Désolée de vous interrompre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do hope you haven't come to tell us that mortal peril fast approaches.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Que se passe-t-il, Lyna<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNA<tab>No. I had hoped to speak with the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNA<tab>Eh bien... J'ai su que <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres était ici, et je voulais justement lui demander quelque chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNA<tab>But there is no need to cut short your meeting on my account. I will be waiting outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNA<tab>J'attendrai dehors que vous en ayez fini avec votre discussion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why not speak in here─she knows I don't mind. Unless she didn't want to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pourquoi faire tant de secrets<var 1D /var>? J'ai l'impression que Lyna est plutôt distante, ces derniers temps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps I might accompany you? Though I am woefully ill-qualified to assist in the Exarch's research, I may yet be of some use to Lyna.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça vous dérangerait que je vous accompagne<var 1D /var>? Nous avons sûrement un peu de temps devant nous avant que le conducteur spirituel soit prêt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNA<tab>Did you slay this eater? Your orders were to await the main force before engaging.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNA<tab>Vous avez abattu le purgateur errant<var 1D /var>? Je vous avais pourtant ordonné de rester en arrière jusqu'à l'arrivée des renforts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIER<tab>No, Captain! It wasn't us, I swear it! A man came out of nowhere and cut it down before we knew what was happening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIER<tab>C'est ce qu'on a fait, Capitaine... Mais un Hume a débarqué de nulle part et s'en est occupé en deux temps, trois mouvements...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNA<tab>By himself? Certainly it is no Lightwarden, but nevertheless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNA<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>? Tu veux dire qu'il l'a affronté seul<var 1D /var>? Ça ne devait pas être le premier venu pour en vaincre un de cette taille...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's true! Felled it with a single swing of his axe, he did! Never seen anything like it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)Ah ça non<var 1D /var>! J'ai jamais vu une brute pareille. Il lui a fait mordre la poussière en un seul coup de son énorme hache<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So I says to him, “Who are you, the Warrior of bleedin' Darkness!?”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)J'ai pas pu m'empêcher de lui demander si c'était lui, le fameux Guerrier des Ténèbres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)And he says, “No, I'm a Warrior of Light.” And that was it. Buggered off as quick as he came.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)Et tout ce qu'il m'a répondu, c'est qu'il était le Guerrier... de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>A Warrior of <var 1A 02 /var>Light<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Le Guerrier de la Lumière<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608<tab>Why would someone go around calling himself that, though? It was those bastards who caused the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608<tab>Ouais, enfin c'est à cause des Guerriers de la Lumière qu'on a eu droit au Déluge. Je préfère pas faire confiance à un type qui prend un nom pareil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608<tab>I mean, if you were going to pretend to be anyone, it'd be <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var><var 1A 01 /var>─the Warrior of Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608<tab>Si tu veux t'extasier, regarde plutôt du côté <var 08 E905 ((de la Guerrière)) ((du Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres, <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> qui a sauvé notre monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Eh? Oh! I─ I didn't know! It's an honor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)O-ooh, euh... V-veuillez m'excuser pour cette impolitesse<var 1D /var>! C'est un immense honneur de vous rencontrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNA<tab>Since the eater is no longer a threat, our work here is done. Return to your posts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNA<tab>Bon, puisque la menace du purgateur est écartée, je déclare cette mission terminée. Retournez tous à vos postes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608<tab>I had hoped to fight at your side today... But I'll continue to follow your example─and may we meet again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608<tab>J'aurais adoré combattre à vos côtés... Vous avez toujours été un modèle pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA<tab>I apologize for the wasted journey. It seems I overestimated the threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA<tab>Je suis désolée de vous avoir fait vous déplacer pour rien. Quant à ce soi-disant Guerrier de la Lumière, je me demande bien de qui il s'agit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA<tab>As for this “Warrior of Light”... I do not know who would be brazen enough to take that mantle for his own. Whatever it may once have meant, it is forever tainted by the association with the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA<tab>Un Hume avec une hache... Comment penser à quelqu'un d'autre qu'Ardbert<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA<tab>The Exarch told me the truth of Ardbert and his comrades' deeds, and I am aware they played some part in your own triumph. But to most, they are synonymous with the calamity that befell this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA<tab>L'exarque m'a bien expliqué que les Guerriers de la Lumière avaient joué un rôle dans votre victoire, mais les gens conscients de ce fait sont encore peu nombreux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA<tab>Still, if this man is minded to destroy sin eaters, I may forgive him his unfortunate choice of alias.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA<tab>Toujours est-il que cet homme nous a rendu une fière chandelle. Peut-être devrions-nous... le remercier<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>But that is neither here nor there. I thank you for accompanying me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, merci de nous avoir accompagnés. Nous pouvons rentrer l'esprit tranquille, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>With that concluded, shall we return to the Crystarium? There is a proposal I should like to make...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyna a raison, rentrons à Cristarium. Cet épisode vient de me donner une petite idée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>Forgive me. There is one more thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>Ah, une dernière chose...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA<tab>A personal concern of mine. I had hoped you might have a moment to speak privately.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA<tab>J'aimerais vous parler en privé cette fois. Auriez-vous quelques instants à me consacrer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Take your time. I shall go on ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, je pars devant pour L'Observatoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA<tab>I will not mince words. This matter concerns the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA<tab>À vrai dire, c'est au sujet de l'exarque...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNA<tab>Though his countenance belies his age, his demeanor never has. He has seen more than any man should, and grown ever more weary with time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNA<tab>Comme vous le savez, il ne vieillit pas, en apparence. Et pourtant, à son contact, j'ai parfois l'impression d'avoir affaire à un vieillard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNA<tab>But I see I give the wrong impression. While it is true he attempted to open a letter with his salmon fillet the other evening, we are not here because I suspect his mind is deteriorating.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNA<tab>Je ne dis pas ça parce qu'il est casanier, qu'il manque d'énergie, ou que je l'ai déjà vu confondre un couteau à fromage avec un coupe-papier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA<tab>Nor do I believe him to be so maddeningly unconcerned by the prospect of his own death as he once was. Indeed, the opposite is true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA<tab>Non, on dirait toujours qu'il est résigné à son sort, comme s'il s'était déjà préparé à mourir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>It is for this reason that I seek your advice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>Mais les choses ont changé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNA<tab>Since he returned from the Tempest, the Exarch is...not as he was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNA<tab>Depuis votre retour de La Tempête, l'exarque me paraît plus jeune que jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNA<tab>He seems a different man. A <var 1A 02 /var>younger<var 1A 01 /var> man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNA<tab>Surtout ces derniers temps. Vous êtes en train de mener des recherches, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNA<tab>I know not the details of his research, but when I saw him at work recently, there was a glint in his eye that I had never seen before. He looked <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNA<tab>L'autre jour, je l'ai vu en train de parcourir ses notes, et on aurait dit un enfant excité par le futur qui s'offre à lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNA<tab>It was as if he had peered into the future, and for the first time, found joy there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNA<tab>Croyez-moi, rien ne pourrait me faire plus plaisir<var 1D /var>! C'est comme s'il avait été libéré d'un poids sur les épaules.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNA<tab>Though it gladdens me to see him thus, I wonder if I should not keep my distance. I fear that my presence will only anchor him to the past. Remind him of all the pain that came before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNA<tab>Et c'est bien pour ça que je fais en sorte de prendre mes distances avec lui. Je ne voudrais surtout pas le déranger, alors qu'il se porte si bien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Anchors keep us where we have chosen to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous ne le dérangez pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He's lost without you, you know. And he misses you already.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il a l'air de se sentir seul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>...Is that so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>Vraiment, vous croyez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA<tab>He─ Are you sure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA<tab>Vraiment, vous croyez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNA<tab>Then perhaps we might remain as we were. As we have always been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNA<tab>Tant mieux, ça veut dire que je vais pouvoir me comporter avec lui comme je l'ai toujours fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNA<tab>What a relief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNA<tab>J'ai bien fait de me confier à vous. Merci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNA<tab>In that case, I will have to speak with him about the amount of time he is spending at work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNA<tab>Maintenant, j'espère seulement que l'exarque ne va pas s'épuiser à cause de ses recherches...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNA<tab>This research is important, I know, but if he refuses to consider his own health, I will have to consider it for him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNA<tab>Avec cette seconde jeunesse, il serait capable d'oublier qu'il ne faut pas trop forcer à son âge avancé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, this looks to be nearly everyone. Let us begin, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il me semble que tout le monde est réuni. Nous allons pouvoir commencer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though I am usually the first to hold forth at such events, I think, on this occasion, that honor should fall to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce genre de situation, c'est toujours moi qui prends la parole. Mais aujourd'hui, je pense que c'est <var 1A 02 /var>vous<var 1A 01 /var> que la foule a envie d'entendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>They <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be more inclined to take the word of the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>Je suis d'accord. Qui mieux que <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres saurait trouver les mots pour s'adresser aux habitants de Cristarium<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. In light of the subject matter, who better than thee to speak these truths?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER<tab>Parfaitement. Après tout, l'histoire des Guerriers de la Lumière du premier reflet vous touche plus que quiconque parmi nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608<tab>Wicked white... The Warriors of Light did all that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608<tab>C'est ça, la vérité sur les Guerriers de la Lumière<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So they never─ I mean, they only ever wanted to help? And when everything they'd done turned to ash, they <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> carried on...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)Alors, ils sont bien à l'origine du Déluge. Mais quel choc d'apprendre ce qu'ils ont fait après...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608<tab>They gave everything to stop the Flood... First their lives, then their souls...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608<tab>Il faut un immense courage pour sacrifier sa vie... et voyager dans un autre monde pour sauver le sien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608<tab>And they managed it, too─in the end. They <var 1A 02 /var>saved<var 1A 01 /var> us. And we cursed their names.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608<tab>Pendant toutes ces années, on a passé notre temps à les tenir res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles, alors qu'on savait rien, en fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUD<tab>This should go a long way towards clearing the air.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avec ça, on peut espérer que l'honneur des Guerriers de la Lumière sera peu à peu rétabli.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Impossible...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Hein<var 1D /var>? C'est impossible<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can see him too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous pouvez le voir aussi, Alphinaud<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I take it I'm not imagining this, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tout le monde peut le voir<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I definitely see <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>. You don't think it's a ghost, do you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, je le vois très bien. Serait-ce... un fantôme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGER<tab>Nay. Yonder standeth no bloodless apparition, but a Warrior of Light and Darkness both. Ardbert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGER<tab>Je peux le voir, moi aussi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>What in the world...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's you! The one who slew the eater...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)Mais... C'est celui qui nous a aidés en abattant le purgateur errant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)That it should be the Warrior of Darkness who brought the truth to light... You've saved me a fair bit of time─though I have a few words of my own to say, if I may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Homme aux traits d'Ardbert-)Quelle surprise de voir <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres en personne révéler la vérité sur nous autres Guerriers de la Lumière... Merci de m'avoir facilité la tâche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)People of the Crystarium! I am Ardbert, one of those you know as a Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Homme aux traits d'Ardbert-)Habitants de Cristarium... Je suis Ardbert, un des Guerriers de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608<tab>That's impossible! You should be dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608<tab>Mais... On vient de nous dire que vous vous êtes tous sacrifiés pour arrêter le déluge de Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Aye, that I should. But as the world has been given new life, so too have I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Tout juste. Mais quand les Guerriers des Ténèbres ont redonné à notre monde son véritable visage, je suis revenu à la vie. Mes camarades n'ont pas eu cette chance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)I know not why I, and I alone, have been gifted this chance. But I do know this: only by the will of the star itself could such a miracle come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)C'est la Lumière qui l'a voulu, comme elle m'a confié la mission d'éveiller de nouveaux Guerriers de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The hero who stands before you now─the Warrior of Darkness─is not of this world. And the day will come when <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> must return to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Ces “Guerriers des Ténèbres” ne sont pas les héros de notre monde. Ils sont venus ici en voyageant à travers les dimensions, et tôt ou tard, ils devront rentrer chez eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But this land is <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> home. And if it is to remain so, now and forevermore, it is <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> who must protect it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)C'est pour ça que les seuls à pouvoir protéger notre monde, c'est <var 1A 02 /var>vous<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The time to rely on saviors from afar has passed. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who must rise. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> who must become the new Warriors of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)L'époque où vous attendiez qu'on vous sauve est révolue... Dorénavant, c'est <var 1A 02 /var>vous<var 1A 01 /var> les héros<var 1D /var>! Prenez votre destin en main et devenez les Guerriers de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Wha─ Us? Warriors of Light?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Soldat courageux-)... Nous, des Guerriers de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)None of us were born heroes, my friend. I was only ever a man with a thirst for adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Tous les héros ne naissent pas avec un don ou un pouvoir particulier. Moi-même, je n'étais rien de plus qu'un simple aventurier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But wherever my journeys took me, I was invariably confronted with the same choice: to lend what aid I could to those in need─or not. And I always chose the former.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Ce n'est qu'en voyageant et en aidant les gens sur mon chemin que j'ai fini par être appelé “Guerrier de la Lumière”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Any one of you could do the same. All you need is the will to help your fellow man, and the resolve to see it through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Vous avez en vous ce qu'il faut pour le devenir. Ce qui compte, c'est la volonté de vous battre pour ce monde et pour son peuple<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGER<tab>From thine own lips did we learn of Ardbert's fate, and by thy countenance, I gather thou art not inclined to recant thy testimony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGER<tab>Vous m'avez raconté ce qu'il est advenu de l'âme d'Ardbert, après la bataille de La Tempête. Et pourtant, il se trouve bien sous nos yeux, et ses paroles sonnent juste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGER<tab>Yet whosoever this man may be, his words hold truth─and resonate with the citizenry besides. For us to voice our doubts here and now would serve but to sow disquiet. 'Twere better we retired unto the Ocular, and there discussed this matter in private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGER<tab>En lui répondant maintenant, nous ne ferions que susciter la confusion dans la foule. Retirons-nous plutôt à L'Observatoire pour nous concerter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Go. I will stay here and watch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour ma part, je vais rester ici pour le garder à l'œil, et je le suivrai si nécessaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So that is a Warrior of Light of the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je vois, il s'agirait donc du Guerrier de la Lumière du premier reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have not had the pleasure of making his acquaintance, but as you all seem to be in agreement, I gather this is no simple case of mistaken identity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Puisque vous avez croisé sa route par le passé, je doute qu'il y ait erreur sur la personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGG<tab>As far as I was able to discern, that was indeed Ardbert. It has been a long time, but not that long. Could he truly have been resurrected as he claims?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGG<tab>Si ce n'est pas Ardbert, c'est son sosie parfait. Mais comment a-t-il pu revenir à la vie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>. Absolutely not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il ne peut pas avoir ressuscité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It looks like him and sounds like him. But it <var 1A 02 /var>isn't<var 1A 01 /var> him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Cet homme ne peut pas être Ardbert<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGER<tab>Ardbert did entrust his very soul unto thee. I see no reason to question thy judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGER<tab>Je suis de votre avis. Ardbert vous a confié son âme à la fin du combat contre Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLA<tab>Nor I. To my eyes, your aether burns as brightly as the day you slew Emet-Selch. That is proof that he is with you still.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, et je peux voir que ton âme n'a en rien perdu de son éclat. C'est bien la preuve qu'il est toujours à tes côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGER<tab>Yet that which standeth now before the people is far more than a passing imitation. I am reminded of the Cardinal Virtues...though a sin eater he is not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGER<tab>Ardbert ne peut pas être revenu d'entre les morts... et pourtant, il est bien là. Cela me rappelle les quatre apôtres, mais son apparence n'était pas celle d'un purgateur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>Which leaveth but one plausible explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>Dans ce cas, je ne vois qu'une hypothèse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>That he is an Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>Un Ascien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Given their fondness for posthumous possession, I would have to agree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En effet, ça ne serait pas la première fois qu'un Ascien s'approprie l'enveloppe charnelle de quelqu'un d'autre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>From what I understand, the Warriors of Light were laid to rest in Eulmore by those whom they had aided in life. At the time, some few still remembered them as heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ce que je sais, c'est que les Guerriers de la Lumière ont été enterrés à Eulmore, bien avant qu'ils soient appelés grands pécheurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Needless to say, four of them were subsequently exhumed to serve as the Virtues. And if one knew where to look, Ardbert too would not have been difficult to find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Excepté celui d'Ardbert, leurs cadavres ont été transformés en purgateurs, les quatre apôtres. L'Ascien aura donc utilisé le corps restant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Assuming then that this is indeed the work of an Ascian, my mind inevitably turns to the last remaining Paragon to survive the sundering...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>En parlant d'Asciens, il n'en reste plus qu'un originel, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGER<tab>That Zenos hath reclaimed his own flesh is known.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGER<tab>D'après ce que vous nous avez dit, Zenos a depuis peu repris possession de son enveloppe charnelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGER<tab>Thus evicted from his borrowed form...and cognizant, no doubt, of Emet-Selch's failure here in the First...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGER<tab>Cela signifie donc que notre cher médiateur à la coule blanche a dû trouver une autre dépouille pour poursuivre son œuvre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGER<tab>'Tis quite possible the emissary chose Ardbert for his next vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGER<tab>Emet-Selch disparu, il a donc décidé de s'emparer du corps d'Ardbert...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG<tab>Inhabiting the flesh of the fallen... My, that is unsavory. And they do this often, you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG<tab>Se servir de défunts pour réaliser leurs desseins... Ces Asciens ont-ils toujours recours à cette méthode<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGER<tab>Verily, for they possess no corporeal forms of their own. In what one may term their natural state, none save those gifted with the Echo can perceive them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGER<tab>Oui, c'est d'ailleurs ce qui les caractérise. Pour eux qui n'ont pas d'incarnation physique, c'est le seul moyen de communiquer avec les humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGER<tab>Indeed, when Elidibus intruded upon the Waking Sands, his presence did go unmarked by all save Minfilia and the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGER<tab>Lorsqu'Elidibus nous a rendu visite au Refuge des sables, <var 08 E905 ((seules)) ((seuls)) /var> Minfilia et notre <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> étaient capables de le voir. Pour ma part, j'ai à peine ressenti sa présence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGER<tab>On that occasion, I myself remained ignorant of his coming until after his departure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGER<tab>De toute évidence, le pouvoir de l'Écho est la clef pour percevoir ces êtres insaisissables.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGER<tab>'Twas only at a later juncture, when he deigned to appear before me in borrowed flesh that I was finally able to take the measure of him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGER<tab>Au cours des âges, les Asciens ont utilisé une multitude d'apparences pour s'ingérer dans l'histoire humaine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGER<tab>In such puppetry do the Ascians engage when they seek to influence the course of history.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGER<tab>Par exemple, quand Elidibus est entré en contact avec moi, il l'a fait en se servant du corps de quelqu'un, puisqu'Alisaie et Thancred ont pu le voir aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>And they have gained much by it. Emet-Selch single-handedly built the Garlean Empire in this manner, while Lahabrea came close to conquering Eorzea having taken possession of Thancred's living body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>Lahabrea s'est quant à lui servi de Thancred, et Emet-Selch a eu recours au corps d'un Garlemaldais pour devenir l'empereur Solus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGER<tab>Yet it must needs be noted that the Ascians cannot avail themselves of <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> mortal vessels. For were they able to do so, none would serve as a better pawn than our own redoubtable champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGER<tab>Mais cela ne signifie pas pour autant qu'ils peuvent s'approprier n'importe quelle enveloppe charnelle. Si c'était le cas, il y a longtemps qu'ils auraient utilisé celle de notre <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGER<tab>Mayhap the blessing of Light shieldeth Hydaelyn's chosen from Ascian influence. Or mayhap other forces are at work. We cannot say for certain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGER<tab>S'ils ne le font pas, c'est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment parce que la bénédiction de la Lumière les en empêche, ou pour une autre raison que nous ignorons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever the reason, I hope it holds true. I dare not contemplate what might come to pass otherwise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Rien que d'y penser, ça fait froid dans le dos... Nous n'aurions pas l'ombre d'une chance face à un tel adversaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Is it not peculiar, then, that Ardbert's mortal remains should be susceptible, given that he was once a Warrior of Light? Or did the final departure of his soul make it possible, perhaps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Autrefois, Ardbert bénéficiait lui aussi de la bénédiction de la Lumière. Je suppose qu'une fois son âme disparue, Elidibus n'a eu aucune peine à s'emparer de sa dépouille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLA<tab>Regardless, to hear an Ascian use him to call forth new Warriors of Light boggles the mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLA<tab>Tout de même, quel étrange spectacle. Un Ascien haranguant une foule d'humains pour les inciter à devenir des Guerriers de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus hath ever been an enigma, his ostensible purpose being to preserve the balance between Light and Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus le médiateur... Ascien originel vêtu de blanc et garant de l'équilibre entre la Lumière et les Ténèbres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>When he made overtures towards me, however, I was afforded a glimpse behind the mask of the self-appointed emissary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>Je me rappelle notre entrevue comme si c'était hier...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER<tab>I shall not defend mine actions, undertaken in pursuit of a better understanding of our foe, as either wise or prudent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER<tab>Lorsque j'ai appris de sa bouche la vérité sur la fragmentation de notre monde et sa réunification planifiée, j'étais déterminé à retourner son plan contre lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGER<tab>Nevertheless, what little I did glean may now prove useful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGER<tab>Même si avec du recul, je réalise que c'était une décision irréfléchie et arbitraire, elle nous aura quand même permis d'en savoir plus sur ce personnage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus possesseth a subtle mind, practiced in the art of manipulation. That he coaxed this star's most valiant heroes as far as the Source with naught save half-truths is no trifling feat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGER<tab>Pour le décrire, je dirais qu'il s'agit du plus subtil des intrigants. Il a tout de même réussi à convaincre Ardbert et ses compagnons de sacrifier leur vie pour les attirer dans le monde primitif et en faire ses pantins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER<tab>And now, I believe, he doth employ his skills once more to some as-yet-unknown end. Though naught is certain, should my suspicions prove true, we shall have need of all our wits if we are to uncover─and thereafter thwart─his plot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER<tab>Pour moi, il ne fait aucun doute qu'il avait une très bonne raison de s'adresser à la foule aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. 'Tis plain that simply speaking out against him will not avail us. At best, it would only serve to confuse the people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Lui tenir tête alors que les Cristariens venaient tout juste d'apprendre la vérité sur les Guerriers de la Lumière aurait eu pour seul effet de compliquer la situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And I would hesitate to do anything which might tarnish Ardbert's reputation once more, nor yours by association.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quant à toi, qui portes l'âme d'Ardbert, je doute que tu aies envie de le voir revenir si vite au cœur de tous les soupçons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, it may be wise to keep a covert eye on this “Ardbert's” movements as we attempt to discern his purpose and how best to mitigate his influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour le moment, nous avons tout intérêt à observer dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment Elidibus en évitant d'attirer l'attention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGG<tab>His performance appears to have concluded. What now─go back out and follow him?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGG<tab>On dirait qu'il en a fini avec son discours. Vous voulez vraiment en rester là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGER<tab>'Twould appear Master Alphinaud already hath pursuit in mind, and I suspect one pair of eyes shall better serve our cause than half a dozen. Let the rest of us maintain an inconspicuous distance─for the present, at least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud nous a dit qu'il le tiendrait à l'œil, faisons-lui confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001650_ALMET<tab>Come. Our new discoveries are to be found this way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001650_ALMET<tab>Voilà, nous y sommes. Les ruines sont en bas de ces marches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001660_YSHTOLA<tab>The people of Ronka are known to have venerated animals, but these features do not match those of any indigenous species. This is no common beast.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001660_YSHTOLA<tab>Quelle imposante statue... Si je ne m'abuse, les Ronka vénéraient les animaux comme des divinités.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001670_YSHTOLA<tab>Though that much is plain from its proportions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001670_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais... je trouve celui-ci plutôt monstrueux, pour un animal...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001680_CYMET<tab>Lifelike, is it not? One could almost imagine it breathed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001680_CYMET<tab>Avec son air effrayant, il en paraîtrait presque vivant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001690_UIMET<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001690_UIMET<tab>GRAOU<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001700_CYMET<tab>Aaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001700_CYMET<tab>Aaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001710_UIMET<tab>Hahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001710_UIMET<tab>Ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001711_CYMET<tab>Why, you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001711_CYMET<tab>Hé, c'est pas sympa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>This owl, by contrast, seems no different from the others we've seen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>Quant à celle-ci, c'est la chouette que nous connaissons bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001730_ALMET<tab>The sealed door lies ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001730_ALMET<tab>Regardez. On dirait que la porte est au fond.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001740_ALMET<tab>As you see, one statue is missing. I expect we are meant to replace it, as before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001740_ALMET<tab>Une statuette de chouette, d'un seul côté... Est-ce qu'on doit en poser une autre sur le piédestal vide, comme la dernière fois<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>Too simple. There will be some additional defense mechanism.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>Non, ce serait trop simple... À première vue, il n'y a aucun dispositif qui bloque le passage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001760_YSHTOLA<tab>Just a moment─there are words carved into the stone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001760_YSHTOLA<tab>Attendez, il y a des ins<var 16 /var>crip<var 16 /var>tions ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>He...who would disturb...a hero's deserved slumber...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour, troubler... le sommeil... de notre héroïne...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001780_YSHTOLA<tab>Shall instead...waken the beast...and know...his folly...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001780_YSHTOLA<tab>Réveiller... le gardien... Réveiller le gardien endormi... tu devras...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001790_YSHTOLA<tab>Wait! Don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001790_YSHTOLA<tab>Non, attends<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001800_UIMET<tab>Wh-What? But I only─ What is happening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001800_UIMET<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Quoi<var 1D /var>? Mais, j-j'ai rien fait<var 1D /var>! Mais q-qu'est-ce qui se passe, là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001810_CYMET<tab>Oh no... Oh no, no, no... I-It lives!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001810_CYMET<tab>Oh non non non<var 1D /var>! Je savais bien qu'elle était vivante, cette statue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001820_YSHTOLA<tab>Why am I not surprised? Prepare yourselves!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001820_YSHTOLA<tab>Vous chouinerez plus tard. En attendant, il faut l'affronter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem the magicks have returned us. How polite.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>Aaah, on a réussi à s'en sortir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, what have we learned?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Te rends-tu compte que ton imprudence a failli nous coûter la vie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001850_UIMET<tab>Oh, we were bound to run into a living statue eventually. And now we can open the door!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001850_UIMET<tab>Bah, on a rien de cassé et on peut ouvrir la porte, c'est ce qui compte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001860_YSHTOLA<tab>“He who would disturb a hero's deserved slumber...”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001860_YSHTOLA<tab>Bref... L'inscription parlait de troubler le sommeil d'une héroïne. Voyons voir de quoi il s'agit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001870_YSHTOLA<tab>A tomb, just as I thought. Befitting a hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001870_YSHTOLA<tab>Cet endroit est bien un mausolée, et c'est vraisemblablement un personnage important de l'ancien empire ronka qui y est enterré.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001880_ALMET<tab>She is Viis! Could it be the archmage Tiuna?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001880_ALMET<tab>Sur cette fresque, on dirait une Viis... Ce ne serait pas Tiuna, l'archimage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001890_ALMET<tab>A legendary hero of Ronka, as you surmised. The tales tell of how she smote entire armies with a single incantation, so potent was her spellcraft─though she ever fought in the name of peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001890_ALMET<tab>C'est une illustre héroïne de l'époque ronka. On raconte que grâce à ses sorts surpuissants, elle a repoussé les ennemis de l'Empire et préservé la paix pour les siens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001900_UIMET<tab>I thought them no more than tales. To think she really existed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001900_UIMET<tab>J'ai toujours pensé que c'était un mythe. Tiuna a vraiment existé alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001910_CYMET<tab>Well, I for one always believed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001910_CYMET<tab>Moi, j'y ai toujours cru<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>I wonder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais alors... Cette fresque...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001930_YSHTOLA<tab>By the light...of fallen stars...great power awakens...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001930_YSHTOLASous une... pluie d'étoiles...
L'héroïne s'éveilla... à son pouvoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001940_ALMET<tab>Tiuna was not only a master of spellcraft. It is said she could see truths long lost and hear the voices of men's hearts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001940_ALMET<tab>D'après la légende, Tiuna était capable de <var 1A 02 /var>voir la vérité<var 1A 01 /var> et d'<var 1A 02 /var>entendre la voix du cœur<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001950_YSHTOLA<tab>Naught less than the Echo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001950_YSHTOLA<tab>Ça ressemble fortement au pouvoir de l'Écho...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>In which case...none of this is mere coincidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>Je ne peux pas croire que ce soit le fruit du hasard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001970_YSHTOLA<tab>A shower of stars setting the sky aflame─and in both this world and the Source, we find individuals within whom a mysterious power awakened at the sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001970_YSHTOLA<tab>Une pluie d'étoiles s'abat sur le monde, et ceux qui en sont témoins acquièrent des capacités surnaturelles... On entend parfois des histoires semblables, dans le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001980_YSHTOLA<tab>We could never unpick the why of it. Now, however...I believe we might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001980_YSHTOLA<tab>Même si la véritable raison est encore obscure, on peut imaginer une hypothèse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001990_YSHTOLA<tab>Does the scene depicted here not resemble the one we saw when we first ventured into the Qitana Ravel?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001990_YSHTOLA<tab>Cette fresque ne te rappelle-t-elle pas celle qu'on a vue dans l'Enchevêtrement des Qitari<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002000_YSHTOLA<tab>Moreover, does it not recall that which Emet-Selch invited us to witness in Amaurot?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002000_YSHTOLA<tab>Et puis, il y a la vision d'apocalypse que nous a montrée Emet-Selch, à Amaurote. Ça fait quand même beaucoup de coïncidences...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>The Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>Si les recherches de l'exarque et de Beq Lugg nous ont bien appris une chose, c'est que l'âme et la mémoire sont intimement liées...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>If, as the Exarch's research suggests, soul and mind share a fragile yet profound bond, might it not be possible for an event to leave such a deep imprint upon the soul that it could be perceived eons later─given a suitable trigger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>Imaginez que l'image d'une lointaine apocalypse soit gravée quelque part au fond de notre âme... Le fait d'assister à un phénomène similaire pourrait peut-être provoquer une réaction en nous, qui sait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>The Echo defies explanation by conventional aetherological theory. Or shall we say, modern aetherological theory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>Plus j'y pense, et plus j'en suis convaincue... Ça ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>rait pourquoi le mécanisme de l'Écho reste un mystère pour l'éthérologie moderne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002040_YSHTOLA<tab>But if it is a power that once belonged to the ancients, to souls yet undivided...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002040_YSHTOLA<tab>Et si ces réminiscences d'apocalypse avaient pour effet de réveiller un pouvoir ancien qui sommeille en nous depuis l'antiquité, avant la fragmentation de l'humanité...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002045_YSHTOLA<tab>...Ah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002045_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem I have entered the realm of pure speculation. And I call myself a scholar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>Pardonnez-moi, je me mets à débiter des suppositions, sans aucun fondement. Ce n'est pas digne d'une érudite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002060_YSHTOLA<tab>I shall refrain from making any further wild claims until such time as I have evidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002060_YSHTOLA<tab>J'aimerais avoir des preuves pour soutenir mon hypothèse, mais ce n'est sûrement pas ici que nous les trouverons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002070_YSHTOLA<tab>Still, I cannot choose but be reminded of our experience in Amaurot...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002070_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est juste que... à l'instant où j'ai posé les yeux sur cette fresque, je me suis rappelé la vision que nous avons eue à Amaurote...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then you must recall Emet-Selch's dying request.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Emet-Selch a dit “Souviens-toi de nous”...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will not soon forget it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je n'oublierai jamais ce moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002080_YSHTOLA<tab>“Remember us.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002080_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, Emet-Selch nous a demandé de ne jamais oublier qu'ils avaient existé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002090_ALMET<tab>“History is learned, not lived.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002090_ALMET<tab>Tout comme nous autres chasseuses protégeons ces ruines, les Ronka prenaient grand soin de ce qui leur était légué par les générations passées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002100_ALMET<tab>We have always protected the tales of Ronka, just as we have protected this place. But we are mindful of what our mothers taught us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002100_ALMET<tab>C'est d'ailleurs pour ça que nous avons ce proverbe, “lire le passé n'est pas le vivre”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002110_ALMET<tab>We see the past through our own eyes, and speak of it with our own words. Thus do we come to understand it, in our own way. But this is not the same as remembering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002110_ALMET<tab>Celui qui découvre une époque antérieure à la sienne peut tout à fait comprendre ce qui s'y est déroulé, mais c'est forcément à travers son point de vue d'habitant du présent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>Your mothers were wise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>En effet, il y a une part de vérité là-dedans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002130_YSHTOLA<tab>Though we witnessed the Final Days, our impressions could not fail to be colored by our own experiences and expectations. Those who lived through it would have perceived the event quite differently.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002130_YSHTOLA<tab>Si nous avons ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment pu assister à l'apocalypse d'Amaurote, nous l'avons forcément ressentie dif<var 16 /var>fé<var 16 /var>rem<var 16 /var>ment de ceux qui ont vécu cette tragédie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002140_YSHTOLA<tab>We must bear in mind that it is no simple matter to keep the truth alive, or it will die with Emet-Selch and his kin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002140_YSHTOLA<tab>Transmettre cette histoire telle qu'Emet-Selch nous l'a racontée sera peut-être une tâche plus dure que je l'avais imaginée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002150_YSHTOLA<tab>But we have disturbed Tiuna long enough. Fanow will serve similarly well as a venue for our contemplations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002150_YSHTOLA<tab>Bon, nous devrions éviter de troubler le sommeil de l'héroïne de Ronka plus longtemps. Rentrons à Fanow.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002160_THANCRED<tab>If you were hoping to vent your frustrations on our eater friend here, I can only apologize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002160_THANCRED<tab>On s'est occupés du purgateur errant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002170_RYNE<tab>Few as they are now, it took us no time at all to track it down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002170_RYNE<tab>On n'a eu aucun mal à le trouver. Moins ils sont nombreux, plus on peut les pister facilement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>That suits our purpose perfectly. Now we need only wait for Ardbert to arrive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'à attendre ce soi-disant Ardbert, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002190_ALISAIE<tab>Weren't you two meant to be attending to the Empty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002190_ALISAIE<tab>Au fait, Thancred... Avec Ryne, vous étiez partis explorer Le Grand Vide, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que vous avez découvert<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002200_THANCRED<tab>We were, and are. But we can hardly ignore the rest of the world, so we thought we might see how things were coming along. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002200_THANCRED<tab>On a encore beaucoup à faire, là-bas. Mais vu l'urgence de la situation, on a préféré faire une pause pour venir vous donner un coup de main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002210_THANCRED<tab>We were indeed, and we've made a certain amount of progress. So we thought we might see how the rest of the world was getting on. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002210_THANCRED<tab>On a bien avancé, là-bas. Du coup, on a préféré faire une pause pour venir vous donner un coup de main, vu l'urgence de la situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002220_RYNE<tab>Right now, we think we can do more good here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002220_RYNE<tab>C'est important de pouvoir compter sur ses amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>It is heartening to have all present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>On se sent plus forts quand on est tous réunis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed! We will be glad of the additional hands should matters escalate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, on ne sait jamais ce qui pourrait arriver... Si af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment il y a, je nous préfère au complet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002250_URIANGER<tab>Our quarry is come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002250_URIANGER<tab>Tiens, la personne qui nous intéresse est arrivée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002260_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Hah. It seems I've lost this particular race.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002260_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)On dirait bien que c'est moi qui suis en retard, cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002270_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Ah, though I suppose it's only fair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002270_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Tu ne te souviens pas de ce qui s'est passé lors de notre première rencontre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002280_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)When we first met, it was I who outpaced you. Ravana, was it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002280_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Mes compagnons et moi, on avait abattu le Primordial qui t'était promis. Il s'appelait Ravana, je crois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002290_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But where are my manners? I wouldn't be here were it not for you, and I have yet to say a word of thanks!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002290_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Au fait, je ne t'ai pas encore <var 08 E905 ((remerciée)) ((remercié)) /var>. Si j'ai pu revenir à la vie, c'est bien grâce à toi<var 1D /var>! Je t'en suis pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que faites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Extend a friendly fist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tendre le poing

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ask whether he wishes Seto were here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Parler de Seto

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002300_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Arm giving you trouble? You should have it examined.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002300_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Eh bien<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui t'arrive, tout à coup<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002310_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Poor fellow. He will be sorely missed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002310_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Ah oui, Seto... C'était vraiment un type bien. Dommage qu'on ne se reverra jamais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Indeed...<var 1A 02 /var>Ardbert<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu n'es pas Ardbert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were supposed to be good at this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qui es-tu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002320_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002320_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Je vois... Ça veut dire que nous avons fini de jouer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002330_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002330_ELIDIBUS<tab>Je vois... Ça veut dire que nous avons fini de jouer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002340_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002340_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert<var 1D /var>?-)Je n'ai jamais cru pouvoir vous tromper bien longtemps, de toute façon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002350_ELIDIBUS<tab>Je n'ai jamais cru pouvoir vous tromper bien longtemps, de toute façon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Yes, it is I, Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Mon nom est Elidibus. Mais à vous qui avez visité Amaurote en compagnie d'Emet-Selch, je peux aussi dévoiler ma fonction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002370_ELIDIBUS<tab>Through your time in Emet-Selch's imitation of our home, I daresay you have gained a better understanding of my role since last we met. Not that it matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002370_ELIDIBUS<tab>Je suis le médiateur du Concile des Quatorze, instance re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tante de l'humanité originelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>We understand your role, Emissary, but not your goal. What is it that you seek to achieve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dites-nous... Quelles sont vos véritables intentions<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002390_ELIDIBUS<tab>I seek to enact the will of the Convocation, of course. If it helps you to think of me as but another Ascian, no different in nature or purpose from the rest, you are welcome to do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002390_ELIDIBUS<tab>En tant que médiateur, mon rôle est d'appliquer les décisions du Concile. Mais peu importe, vous pouvez me considérer comme tous les autres Asciens que vous avez croisés jusqu'à maintenant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once, I would have said your goal was destruction alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Pendant longtemps, nous pensions que vous ne cherchiez qu'à détruire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Now I understand that you fight for something you love, just as we do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Notre passage au fond de La Tempête nous a donné tort... Vous aussi, vous combattez pour protéger les vôtres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet though we seem doomed to clash, I bid you consider Emet-Selch's final words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais ne pensez-vous pas que nous pourrions nous asseoir autour de la même table et discuter, rien qu'une fois<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Remember that we once lived,” he said. Had he not seen some glimmer of hope in our kind, I do not believe he would have spoken thus.
